Minecraft Legends - Official Launch Trailer
description:
Embark on a quest to stop the piglin invasion in Minecraft Legends. Watch the launch trailer for this action strategy game, available now on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Steam, Windows 11/10, PC Game Pass, Xbox Game Pass, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, and Xbox Cloud Gaming.

#IGN #Minecraft #Gaming

title: LOTR Gollum Nickel and Diming Players for Authentic Voice Acting - IGN Daily Fix
description:
On today's Daily Fix:
Lord of the Rings: Gollum players will have to pay more money for authentic Elvish voice acting. Capcom has revealed that ray tracing support will return to the PC versions of Resident Evil 2 Remake and Resident Evil 3 Remake in a future update after it was accidentally removed last week. Finally, Warner Bros. Games has announced a "standalone Quidditch experience" called Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions, and playtest signups are now open.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Remnant 2 - Official Handler Archetype Overview Trailer
description:
Get a deep dive into the Handler Archetype class in this latest trailer for the upcoming action-survival shooter game Remnant 2, including a breakdown of the class' skills and abilities, like increased healing by petting your dog companion, the revival of companions with the prime perk called bonded, and more.

Remnant II will be available on PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X/S in Summer 2023.

#IGN #Remnant #Gaming

title: Diablo 4 - Official Barbarian Trailer
description:
The latest Diablo IV trailer puts a spotlight on the Barbarian class. Check it out to see this character class in action. Diablo IV will be available on June 6, 2023.

#IGN #Gaming #Diablo4

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 & Warzone - Season 3 Patch Notes Explained
description:
Season 3 of Call of Duty Modern Warfare 2 and Warzone 2 is here and it brought a ton of new patch notes and changes. Between new maps for multiplayer, new game modes variations, and adjusted equipment for Warzone and DMZ, there’s a lot to cover. Here’s everything you need to know about Season 3 of Modern Warfare 2 and Warzone 2.

#IGN #CallOfDuty

title: The First 18 Minutes of Horizon Forbidden West Burning Shores - 4K 60 FPS
description:
Join Aloy as she goes on her newest adventure in the new Horizon Forbidden West Burning Shores DLC.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Meet Your Maker - Official Tips and Tricks Trailer
description:
Meet Your Maker is a post-apocalyptic first-person building-and-raiding game where every level is designed by players. Make your way through maze-like Outposts filled with traps and guards, then gear up for methodical fast-paced combat raiding other players’ creations. Check out the official tips and tricks trailer to be more successful in Meet Your Maker, available now on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, and PC.

#IGN #MeetYourMaker #Gaming

title: Horizon Forbidden West: How to Access the Burning Shores DLC
description:
The brand new PS5-only Burning Shores DLC for Horizon Forbidden West has arrived! So if you're looking to jump right into the new content, then this video will explain exaclty what you need to have completed to access the DLC, and how to get started once you've met all the requirements.

#IGN #HorizonForbiddenWest #Gaming

title: The Mageseeker: A League of Legends Story - Official Launch Trailer
description:
The Mageseeker: A League of Legends Story is a gritty 2D hi-bit pixel action RPG, set in Demacia, a mighty kingdom in the world of Runeterra that seeks to curtail what it deems as forbidden magic while wielding magic themselves to maintain order. Players will embody Sylas, an escaped mage who joins a band of rebels in the deep forest to destroy the deceptive peace of Demacia and uncover the truth of the kingdom's origins. Sylas will utilize his unique spell-stealing abilities to draw upon the magic of his enemies and use those powers against them. The Mageseeker: A League of Legends Story is available now on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Dead Hook VR - Official Announcement Trailer
description:
Check out this Dead Hook VR trailer! Dead Hook VR is a rogue-like VR shooter game with brutal combat and captivating storytelling. Explore the elder planet Resaract and take on the role of Adam Stone, a mercenary, smuggler, thief, and devoted husband. Seek legendary weapons with and tune your character with permanent upgrades and character buffs, take on bosses with multiple phases, and more. Utilize VR game mechanics such as the Hook to get you around the map quickly, energy sword, slo-mo, and more. Dead Hook VR is launching on May 18 for Meta Quest.

#IGN #Gaming #VR

title: Prehistoric Planet 2 - Official Teaser Trailer (2023) David Attenborough
description: Prehistoric Planet combines award-winning wildlife filmmaking, the latest paleontology learnings and state-of-the-art technology to unveil the spectacular habitats and inhabitants of ancient Earth for a one-of-a-kind immersive experience. The series is produced by the world-renowned team at BBC Studios Natural History Unit with support from the photorealistic visual effects of MPC (“The Lion King,” “The Jungle Book”) applied to concept art created by Jellyfish Pictures (“The Book of Boba Fett,” “Spirit: Untamed”). “Prehistoric Planet” season two continues to bring Earth’s history to life like never before as the series presents new dinosaurs, new habitats, and new scientific discoveries while taking viewers around the world in an epic five-night adventure.

title: Watcher of Realms - Official Pre-Registration Teaser
description:
Pre-Registration for Watcher of Realms is available now. Check out the teaser to dive deep into the adventure of Tya. Watcher of Realms will provide you with a unique experience where it has a lot of amazing features tailored for you. Sign up now to be the first commander to enjoy the amazing game when available.

#Watcherofrealms #NextgenmobileRPG #Defendyourrealm

title: Street Fighter 6 Showcase Livestream
description:
Get ready for Capcom’s last look at Street Fighter 6 before the game launches. Join us on April 20th, 3pm PT to catch all the updates from developers as our host, Lil Wayne, gives you everything you need to know before becoming a champion this summer. The action is going to be down right fierce. 

#IGN #Gaming

title: Farming Simulator 23: Nintendo Switch Edition - Official Cinematic Announcement Trailer
description:
Farming Simulator is a simulation farming game where players can build an agricultural empire from scratch by cultivating fields, logging with forestry equipment, or tending to farm animals such as the newly added chickens. Farming Simulator 23 promises a game with more than 100 vehicles and tools to choose from, new crops such as olives and grapes, new gameplay mechanics including production chains, and activities such as weeding and plowing on two maps. Farming Simulator 23 is launching on May 23 for Nintendo Switch and Mobile.

#IGN #FarmingSimulator23 #Gaming

title: Naruto x Boruto Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections - Official Naruto & Sasuke Uchiha Gameplay Trailer
description:
Naruto Uzumaki (Baryon Mode) and Sasuke Uchiha (Supporting Kage) will be joining as new playable characters. Watch the trailer to see the characters in action. Naruto x Boruto Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections will be available in 2023 on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, and Steam.

#IGN #Gaming #Naruto

title: Warhammer 40K: Rogue Trader - Official Locations Trailer
description:
Get a look at some of the diverse locations (including Commorragh, the Dark City of the Webway) you'll be visiting in Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader, the upcoming isometric CRPG set in the Warhammer universe from Owlcat Games. Owlcat notes, "With this trailer, the team wants to show how they recreate the iconic Warhammer 40,000 atmosphere from an isometric point of view: gothic architecture, industrial yet dilapidated cities, and straight-up nightmarish penal colonies." Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader is in development for PC.

#IGN #Warhammer #Gaming

title: The 10 Most Evil Rogue AI in Movie and TV History
description: Artificial Intelligence going rogue and bringing about the demise of humanity is a classic sci-fi story concept, so we're assembling a list of the most iconic evil AI to ever gain malicious sentience. We're talking Skynet from the Terminator franchise, the machines and Agents from the Matrix, and Ultron from Avengers: Age of Ultron. These are the robots we programmed to serve us but it turns out they had other plans.

title: Jagged Alliance 3: The First Preview
description:
We played the first 12 hours of Jagged Alliance 3, the long-awaited sequel to the popular tactics series, and found a game that takes its gameplay pretty seriously (in a good way!) but can't say the same about its tone (and the jury's still out on whether that's good or bad). Previewed on PC by Leana Hafer.

#IGN #Gaming

title: Dead Island 2 Review
description:
Dead Island 2 reviewed by Travis Northup on PlayStation 5 and PC. Also available on Xbox.
Dead Island 2 is a hysterical Los Angeles-infused satire that does most things well enough, but feels like a stroll down the Walk of Fame of celebrated zombie games I’ve already played without adding many new ideas of its own. In fact, aside from the stellar comedy bits, I can think of very few things that Dead Island 2 does better than last year’s Dying Light 2. Still, if you’ve ever wanted to put your Wolverine claws straight through a zombie’s face or knock someone’s head off with a golf club, Dead Island 2’s got you. Its bloodsoaked melee combat and memorable characters are a lot of fun, especially when accompanied by friends in co-op multiplayer. The somewhat generic crafting weapons and upgrading your skills as you lay waste to armies of spray-tanned undead is entertaining enough on its own, but the strong writing and completely irreverent tone are the true stars of the show.

#IGN #DeadIsland #Gaming

title: Ant-Man and The Wasp: Quantumania - Exclusive Official Deleted Scene (2023) - David Dastmalchian
description:
Veb (David Dastmalchian) expresses great excitement when he discovers he finally has holes in this unfinished scene from Marvel Studios’ Ant-Man and The Wasp: Quantumania. The film is available to buy on Digital on April 18 and arrives on 4K Ultra HD, Blu-ray, and DVD on May 16. Bonus content includes deleted scenes, a gag reel, and audio commentary by director Peyton Reed and writer Jeff Loveness. 

Superheroes Scott Lang (Paul Rudd) and Hope Van Dyne (Evangeline Lilly) return to continue their adventures as Ant-Man and The Wasp. Together, with Hope’s parents Janet Van Dyne (Michelle Pfeiffer) and Hank Pym (Michael Douglas), and Scott’s daughter Cassie Lang (Kathryn Newton), the family finds themselves exploring the Quantum Realm, interacting with strange new creatures and embarking on an adventure that will push them beyond the limits of what they thought possible.

Directed by Peyton Reed and produced by Kevin Feige and Stephen Broussard, Ant-Man and The Wasp: Quantumania also stars Jonathan Majors as Kang, David Dastmalchian as Veb, Katy O'Brian as Jentorra, William Jackson Harper as Quaz and Bill Murray as Lord Krylar.

#IGN #Marvel #AntMan

title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Once and Always Review
description: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Once and Always Review commemorates the 30th anniversary of the MMPR franchise with a one-hour special event on Netflix. But is it Morphenomenal or less than phenomenal? Check out our review of Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Once and Always.
